upgrades.name: 2-1B Medical Droid
upgrades.text: Add 1 2-1B Medical Droid miniature. NONCOMBATANT. >Treat 1: Capacity 2

upgrades.name: Astromech Droid
upgrades.text: Add 1 R5 astromech droid mini. >Repair 1: Capacity 2. NONCOMBATANT.

upgrades.name: Rebel Comms Technician
upgrades.text: Add 1 Rebel Comms Technician miniature. /n/This unit gains 1 COMM upgrade icon. This unit must equip at least 1 COMM upgrade.

upgrades.name: Rebel Officer
upgrades.text: Add 1 Rebel Officer miniature. LEADER. /n/This unit increases its courage by 1 and gains INSPIRE 1.

upgrades.name: Rebel Trooper Captain
upgrades.text: Add 1 Rebel Trooper Captain miniature. LEADER. /n/This unit gains 1 TRAINING upgrade icon. /n/At the start of this unit's Activation, you may exhause this card. If you do, this unit cannot remove Suppression tokens or be Suppressed during this Activation.

upgrades.name: Rebel Trooper Specialist
upgrades.text: Add 1 Rebel Trooper Specialist miniature. /n/This unit gains 1 GEAR upgrade icon. /n/EXHAUST> This unit gains 1 Dodge token or 1 Surge token.

upgrades.name: Rebel Trooper Squad
upgrades.text: Add 5 Rebel Trooper miniatures. /n/This unit gains INDOMITABLE. /n/This unit is in cohesion if all miniatures are a RANGE 1 of the unit leader instead of RANGE 1/2. /n/This unit cannot be deployed or issued orders using the TRANSPORT keyword.

upgrades.name: Clone Comms Technician
upgrades.text: Add one Clone Comms Technician miniature. /n/This unit gains FIRE SUPPORT.
